com.mongodb.reactivestreams.client.gridfs

Interface AsyncInputStream

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GridFSDownloadStream

    public interface AsyncInputStream
    The Async Input Stream interface represents some asynchronous input stream of bytes.

    See the com.mongodb.async.client.gridfs.helpers package for adapters that create an AsyncInputStream

    Since:
    1.3

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Success> close()
      Closes the input stream
      org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Integer> read(ByteBuffer dst)
      Reads a sequence of bytes from this stream into the given buffer.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Integer> read(ByteBuffer dst)
        Reads a sequence of bytes from this stream into the given buffer.
        Parameters:
        dst - the destination buffer
        Returns:
        a publisher with a single element, the total number of bytes read into the buffer, or -1 if there is no more data because the end of the stream has been reached.

      • close

        org.reactivestreams.Publisher<Success> close()
        Closes the input stream
        Returns:
        a publisher with a single element indicating when the stream has been closed
